Name: Futa Spell
About the game: Futa Spell is an adult visual novel with a fantasy setting. Shanja and her adventure companion Rile, are on their way to the tower of Niagon. Their mission is to defeat Queen Daena. Will they succeed in their quest? Will they be able to defend themselves from the terrible and dark power of the fearsome witch? Features: Kinetic visual novel. Two variations on the story. Over 10,000 words of story. Contains approximately 350 CG artworks in 1920x1080 format. Original soundtrack. Original fx.
